description: Explore General Electric's strategic use of blockchain in enhancing supply chain management. Learn about the benefits, challenges, and future impact of blockchain technology in GE's operations, including improved transparency, traceability, and security within complex supply networks.
keywords: General Electric, GE, blockchain, supply chain management, transparency, data security, traceability, smart contracts, sustainability, efficiency, innovation, legacy systems, scalability, regulatory compliance, industry collaboration
title: General Electric's Strategic Use of Blockchain in Supply Chain Management
